#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define M 1000000007


typedef long long ll;
ll i,j,dp[100001][318],t,n,k,sum[318],ans;

int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
   	  
	n = 100001;
    for(j=1;j<=317;j++)dp[1][j]=1;
    for(i=2;i<=n-1;i++)
    {
    	sum[0] = 0;
    	for(j=1;j<317;j++)
    	{
    		sum[j] = sum[j-1] + dp[i-1][j];
    		sum[j]%=M;
    		dp[i][j] = sum[j];
    		
    	}
        
    }
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {
   	  cin>>n>>k;
   	  if(n==1)cout<<"-1\n";
   	  else
   	  {
   	  ans = 0;
   	  for(j=1;j<=sqrt(k);j++)
      {
        	
        	if(k/j > (j-1))
        	ans += (k/j - (j -1 ))*(dp[n-1][j]);
            ans %= M;
      }
      cout<<ans<<"\n";
   	  }
   }
    return 0;	
}
